Synopsis: Exports objects to a datatable on disk
Description: Exports objects to a datatable.  Objects in the datatable must be serialiazble in order to be stored.
Notes: A datatable will not be able to be exported if it contains live objects that do not implement ISerializable.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
dir | 
    select Name, LastWriteTime, CreationTime | 
    Export-DataTable -OutputPath .\Files.bin
Import-DataTable .\Files.bin
